title: Save The Link - Web Application
subTitle: June 2017
description: Developed a single page web application in the React Riot 2017 Hackathon that save your favourite links online.

descriptionLinks.data: Used ReactJS and React Material Components

title: ngDownloader - Web Application
subTitle: May 2017
description: Developed a single page web application in the Angular Attack 2017 Hackathon that gives the download links of the videos.

descriptionLinks.data: Used youtube-dl, Amazon AWS API Gateway and Amazon AWS Lamda function on backend.

title: Flipkart Product Search
subTitle: April 2017
description: Developed a single page web application to learn AngularJS 1 that gives the list of products based on search query using Flipkart API.

title: To-Do List
subTitle: March 2016
description: Developed a To-Do list web application which runs on the browser. Used the HTML5 local storage so that the to-do list persists even after the page is refreshed.

title: File Explorer
subTitle: March 2017
description: File explorer which runs on the browser. The file structure reside completely on the browser-end and user is able to create, edit and delete files on this virtual file system.

title: Contest Notify
description: Amazon Alexa Skill Kit that will update you about the current and future programming contest available on different websites like codeforces, codechef and hackerrank. You can ask questions like When is the codefoces next contest.

title: Food Helper
description: Amazon Alexa Skill Set that will tell you the details of the nearby restaurant. You can search for Restaurant by saying, Tell me the restaurant nearby Vaishali Nagar. Ex 'Alexa, ask food helper Tell me the restaurant nearby Vaishali Nagar'

title: Content Search
description: Amazon Alexa Skill Kit will help you to get info about any topic or tell details about famous persons. You can ask questions like Tell me something about water, tell me something about google or who is Mark Zuckerberg.

title: Build a Portfolio Site
subTitle: November 2016
description: Developed a personal portfolio page using HTML, CSS, and the Bootstrap framework. The page is fully responsive and works on mobile, tablet, and desktop browsers.

title: Online Resume
subTitle: November 2016
description: Using jQuery, developed an interactive resume application that reads all data from a JSON file and then dynamically modifies the DOM to display the information.

title: Classic Arcade Game
subTitle: November 2016
description: Developed a HTML5 Canvas powered video game, developed using the best practices in Object Oriented JavaScript. The goal of the player is to reach the water.

title: Website Optimization
subTitle: November 2016
description: Optimized an inefficient web application's JavaScript, CSS and assets delivery, ensuring it runs at 60fps and achieves a PageSpeed score of at least 90 on both mobile and desktop.

title: Neighborhood Map
subTitle: November 2016
description: Developed a single-page web application, built using the Knockout framework, that displays a Google Map of an area and various points of interest. Users can search landmarks.

title: Feed Reader Testing
subTitle: November 2016
description: Wrote comprehensive unit tests, using the Jasmine testing framework, for an RSS Feed Reader application that uses Google's RSS API so that we can check that it works correctly.

title: Profile Reader
subTitle: December 2015
description: Enter the person name and it will tells the details of the person (from Wikipedia) using the Google Web Speech API.

title: C Programmer
subTitle: May 2015
description: Designed an Android Application for learning of C language with the presence of ease. Built using Android Studio.

title: Facebook ID Card
subTitle: January 2015
description: Developed an application that retrieves the data from facebook profile using Facebook Javascript SDK and generates a ID Card.
